modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to extract acid from cops. Each cop type will drop one bile duct, which can make acid in the chemistry station.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to extract acid from [cops](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/). Basically, now you have a reason to get to the po-po before their loot container disappears. Each cop type will drop one bile duct, which can make acid in the chemistry station.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Cop_Acid)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/)
